https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/deHm0Fp4Ev0oyiYYY2YyCh5XtaA.jpg Serena, a young, gay introvert and her controlling older brother Nathan, are forced to endure a dreaded family gathering at the house of their elegant elderly Aunt Irene to hear the reading of her will - setting off an unexpected course of events that ultimately forces the clan to reevaluate their views on love, forgiveness, and family. A Reason
